meanings.definition: Covered in fuzz or soft hair.
meanings.sent1: The cute bunny had a fezzy tail.
meanings.sent2: The peach felt fezzy to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The fezzy kitten looked like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The fezzy blanket enveloped her in warmth.
meanings.sent5: The fezzy teddy bear was a comforting companion.

meanings.definition: Resembling a fez in shape or style.
meanings.sent1: The round hat had a fezzy appearance.
meanings.sent2: The decorative tassel gave the hat a fezzy look.
meanings.sent3: The fezzy hat made him feel like a magician.
meanings.sent4: The fezzy shape of the cushion added an exotic touch.
meanings.sent5: The fezzy design on the rug was eye-catching.
